message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go up to $95. Can you meet me there?
I'm still not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you at $110, which is closer to my minimum price. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $98. Can you meet me there?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $98. I'm willing to meet you at $115, which is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider selling the product to someone else.
